vulnerabilities.Details: Template expression '{{7*7}}' was evaluated to '49'. The response body changed significantly compared to a non-magic string, indicating a high-confidence SSTI via an engine like 'Jinja2 / Twig / Nunjucks / Pebble'.
vulnerabilities.evidence: Output '49' was found in the response.
vulnerabilities.remediation: Avoid using user-supplied input in template structures. Use sandboxed template engines and explicitly pass variables.
